DocLocalization.Name: Festkörper - Entlang einer auf einer Referenzfläche liegenden Leitlinie extrudiert

DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation. The solid is generated by sweeping the _SELF\IfcSweptAreaSolid.SweptArea_ along the _Directrix_.

DocAttribute.Name: StartParam
EndParam

DocWhereRule.Name: DirectrixBounded
